logarithmic-model.png.description: A pyret fit-model plot showing a logarithmic model for pc-gdp and median-income
logarithmic-model.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team

empty-axes.png.description: The first quadrant of an empty cartesian plane, showing x- and y-axes with regular intervals
empty-axes.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team

linear-to-exponential.png.description: The graph of a linear function, with the x-axis on a logarithmic scale
linear-to-exponential.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team

linear-to-logarithmic.png.description: The graph of a linear function, with the y-axis on a logarithmic scale
linear-to-logarithmic.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team

log-rocket.png.description: A screenshot of a Pyret file, showing a rocket superimposed on a logarithmically scaled drawing of the earth's surface. The image is from XKCD, and is used with express permission from the artist.
log-rocket.png.source: Created by the Bootstrap Team, with permission from Randall Monroe

num-line-h.png.description: An exponential sequence of values (1, 3, 9, and 27), plotted as red dots on a horizontal number line
num-line-h.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team

num-line-v.png.description: An exponential sequence of values (1, 3, 9, and 27), plotted as red dots on a vertical number line
num-line-v.png.source: Created in Desmos by the Bootstrap Team
